commit message:
Fixed tiled-bitmaps again

Android 4.1 seems to have broken the fix to the previously broken iled
bitmaps. Loading them and subsequently making them 'repeat' seems to
fail now.

Since the old code was designed to specifically cause local copies of
the resource, we now just build the layered background from scratch
every time.

Detect some bad scanners

Trap security exceptions when scanning, which often seem to mean a bad
scanner is installed.
Add extra details to help requests and crash logs
Removed debugging code from scanner calls

Merge pull request #26 from silin/master

From Nick's repo
